programme.title: Piers Morgan
programme.desc: In a revealing interview about Piers Morgan's rollercoaster career and personal life, Amol Rajan explores everything from hacking allegations to the divisive media figure's belief in God. From sackings to superstardom, from being punched by Jeremy Clarkson to his role in the culture wars, Morgan reveals the emotional and physical scars he has picked up over the decades.
